techmeme.title: Toronto-based Tailscale, which helps set up corporate VPNs, raised $160M led by Accel, a source says at a $1.5B valuation, up from $1B in May 2022 (Katie Roof/Bloomberg)
Turkish startup Sipay, which bills itself as "Stripe for emerging markets", raised a $78M Series B at an $875M valuation to expand outside of Turkey (Mike Butcher/TechCrunch)
Analysts: the original Switch's huge success has given Nintendo a high mountain to climb, and the Switch 2 is a massive bet that fans want more of the same (Financial Times)
Interviews with 40 sources describe concerns about Helsing, Europe's most valuable defense tech startup, including whether it can live up to its €5B valuation (Bloomberg)
Meta rolls out Teen Accounts to Facebook and Messenger, automatically enrolling young users and adding built-in protections, in the US, the UK, and others (Aisha Malik/TechCrunch)
